nodes.text: The Swoop Bike Drag was an area of the Nikto Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The Swoop Bike Drag appears as part of the Nikto Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
